mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , SUPR_ID , SUPMEM_APST , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , SCSS_YN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON , CACOOP_NO
FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(MEMB_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_GUBN_NM , SUPR_ID , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_SUPRID_NM(SUPR_ID) FROM DUAL) AS SUPR_NAME , SUPMEM_APST , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(SUPMEM_APST) FROM DUAL) AS SUPMEM_APST_NM , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , SCSS_YN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , COM_OPEN , COM_CLOSE , KEEP_LOCATION , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(STOP_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON
, MONTH_YN , CACOOP_NO
FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM )
ORDER BY REG_DTM desc
ORDER BY REG_DTM asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NAME desc
ORDER BY MEMB_NAME asc
ORDER BY MEMB_ID desc
ORDER BY MEMB_ID asc
ORDER BY REG_DTM desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(MEMB_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_GUBN_NM , SUPR_ID , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_SUPRID_NM(SUPR_ID) FROM DUAL) AS SUPR_NAME , SUPMEM_APST , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(SUPMEM_APST) FROM DUAL) AS SUPMEM_APST_NM , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , SCSS_YN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , COM_OPEN , COM_CLOSE , KEEP_LOCATION , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON , CACOOP_NO
FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM ORDER BY MEMB_NAME )

SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , SUPR_ID , SUPMEM_APST , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , SCSS_YN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , COM_OPEN , COM_CLOSE , REGEXP_SUBSTR(COM_OPEN, '[^:]+', 1, 1) COM_OPEN_HH , REGEXP_SUBSTR(COM_OPEN, '[^:]+', 1, 2) COM_OPEN_MM , REGEXP_SUBSTR(COM_CLOSE, '[^:]+', 1, 1) COM_CLOSE_HH , REGEXP_SUBSTR(COM_CLOSE, '[^:]+', 1, 2) COM_CLOSE_MM , KEEP_LOCATION , CAR_NUM , ADM_REF , AREA_GUBN , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON
, MONTH_YN , CACOOP_NO FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM WHERE TRIM(MEMB_ID) = TRIM(#{MEMB_ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM SET SCSS_YN = 'Y' , STOP_DTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , MODP_ID = #{REGP_ID} , MOD_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MEMB_ID , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(MEMB_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_GUBN_NM , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_CPON , COM_NAME , COM_TELN , '('||COM_PN||')' || COM_BADR || COM_DADR AS COM_ADR , '('||MEMB_PN||')' || MEMB_BADR || MEMB_DADR AS MEMB_ADR , TO_CHAR(REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DTM , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM /*회원정보*/
AND A.ORDER_NUM IN
#{item}
)
ORDER BY REG_DTM desc
ORDER BY REG_DTM asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NAME desc
ORDER BY MEMB_NAME asc
ORDER BY MEMB_ID desc
ORDER BY MEMB_ID asc
ORDER BY REG_DTM desc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO POLARBEAR.TMP_MBINFOXM_DEL ( MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , SUPR_ID , SUPMEM_APST , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , COM_OPEN , COM_CLOSE , KEEP_LOCATION , CAR_NUM , ADM_REF , AREA_GUBN , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON , CACOOP_NO )
SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , SUPR_ID , SUPMEM_APST , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , COM_OPEN , COM_CLOSE , KEEP_LOCATION , CAR_NUM , ADM_REF , AREA_GUBN , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON , CACOOP_NO FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM WHERE MEMB_ID = #{MEMB_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT COMD_CODE , COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'AREA_GUBN' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_ORDR

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(MEMB_GUBN) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_GUBN_NM , SUPR_ID , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_SUPRID_NM(SUPR_ID) FROM DUAL) AS SUPR_NAME , SUPMEM_APST , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(SUPMEM_APST) FROM DUAL) AS SUPMEM_APST_NM , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , SCSS_YN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , COM_OPEN , COM_CLOSE , KEEP_LOCATION , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(STOP_DTM, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON , MONTH_YN , CACOOP_NO FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM )
AND MEMB_GUBN='MEMB_GUBN_04'
ORDER BY REG_DTM desc
ORDER BY REG_DTM asc
ORDER BY MEMB_NAME desc
ORDER BY MEMB_NAME asc
ORDER BY MEMB_ID desc
ORDER BY MEMB_ID asc
ORDER BY REG_DTM desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT MEMB_ID , MEMB_GUBN , SUPR_ID , SUPMEM_APST , APRF_RESN , MEMB_NAME , MEMB_PW , MEMB_SEX , SLCAL_GUBN , MEMB_BTDY , MEMB_MAIL , MEMB_IRA , MEMB_PN , MEMB_BADR , MEMB_DADR , MEMB_CPON , MEMB_CSRA , MEMB_TELN , COM_NAME , COM_BUNB , COM_TELN , COM_PN , COM_BADR , COM_DADR , SCSS_YN , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , TAXCAL_YN , BANK_NAME , BANK_BUNB , STOP_YN , STOP_DTM , DLVY_CPON , CACOOP_NO FROM POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM WHERE POLARBEAR.MEMB_GUBN = 'MEMB_GUBN_04' )
